query: On a Tuesday, a magician said, ``I made my wife disappear 31 days ago.'' What day of the week did he make her disappear?
ground_truth: Since $31 \equiv 3$ (mod 7), he made his wife disappear 3 days before a Tuesday, or $\boxed{\mbox{Saturday}}$.
